ccg-setinfo.name: Second Edition
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: A Living Death
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel on this planet who does not have Treachery is attributes -1. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

card.name: Aggressive Behavior
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Leadership and Weapons>8, randomly select a personnel to be killed, all your other personnel are stopped, and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

card.name: Alien Abduction
card.text: Unless you have 2 Engineer and Physics or Medical and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Antedean Assassins
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Telepathy, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Telepathy personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to it's dil

card.name: Armus Roulette
card.text: Randomly select four personnel. Unless they have Cunning>22 or one of them has Cunning>7, your opponent chooses one of them to be killed, then the other three are stopped.

card.name: Assassin's Blade
card.text: Unless you have 2 Security or Cunning>26, your opponent chooses a personnel (except an Android or a Shape-shifter) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Assassination Attempt
card.text: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who does not have Treachery is killed.

card.name: Authenticate Artifacts
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Archaeology, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Archaeology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its

card.name: Automated Weapons
card.text: Unless you have 2 Security or a Hand Weapon, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Berserk Changeling
card.text: Unless you have 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 3 Security or two Hand Weapons, randomly select a personnel (except a Changeling) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Blended
card.text: Unless you have Diplomacy or Telepathy, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two more personnel who have Diplomacy or Telepathy, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Bynars' Password
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Engineer or a personnel who has 2 Programming, your opponent chooses an Engineer or Programming personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's

card.name: Captain's Holiday
card.text: Unless you have 2 Archaeology or 2 Geology, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Center of Attention
card.text: Unless you have 3 Security or a Hand Weapon and Cunning>28 or Quark, your opponent chooses a Treachery personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Chula: Echoes
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If the highest Cunning among those personnel is even, all three of them are stopped.

card.name: Chula: Pick One to Save Two
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. Choose to return one of those personnel to its owner's hand or to have all three of them be stopped.

card.name: Command Decisions
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Console Overload
card.text: Unless you have 2 Engineer or 2 Programming, choose a personnel who has Medical or Science to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Contamination
card.text: Unless you have Engineer and Physics or 2 Exobiology, all your Medical personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Damaged Reputation
card.text: If you have Integrity>50, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Intelligence and 2 Treachery or Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Dangerous Liaisons
card.text: Unless you have 2 Science and 2 Security or 3 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Debris Field
card.text: Unless you have Astrometrics or Navigation, all your Engineer personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Drumhead
card.text: Unless you have Law, randomly select a personnel who has Integrity<4 to be placed in its owner's discard pile. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Enemy Boarding Party
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel who has Strength<6 is killed.

card.name: Equipment Malfunction
card.text: Return all your equipment to their owner's hands.

card.name: Explosive Decompression
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

card.name: Gravimetric Distortion
card.text: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics or 3 Engineer or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

card.name: Graviton Ellipse
card.text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Physics or Shields + unused Range this turn>13, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

card.name: Hunter Gangs
card.text: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who has Cunning+Strength<11 is killed.

card.name: Impressive Trophies
card.text: Unless you have Cunning>32, your personnel who has the highest cost is placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Invidium Leak
card.text: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Medical, all your personnel are stopped.

card.name: Kelvan Show of Force
card.text: Your opponent chooses two personnel (except an Android or a Hologram). Randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

card.name: Kolaran Raiders
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Security to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Limited Welcome
card.text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped. Place this dilemma on this mission. When you attempt this mission again, after you opponent draws dilemmas, he or she may take this dilemma and add it to those drawn.

card.name: Maglock
card.text: Unless you have 3 Officer or 3 Programming, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Magnetic Field Disruptions
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Astrometrics or Navigation to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Microbrain
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Exobiology or a personnel who has 2 Geology, your opponent chooses an Exobiology or Geology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dile

card.name: Misguided Activist
card.text: Randomly select a {Cmd} personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Honor or 2 Security or Miles O'Brien, that personnel is killed instead.

card.name: Nanite Attack
card.text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Engineer or 2 Security and a Hand Weapon, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the end of each of your turns, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

card.name: None Shall Pass
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 3 Diplomacy or Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Ornaran Threat
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and Medical or 2 Security, that personnel is killed instead, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Personal Duty
card.text: Unless you have Leadership or Officer, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two more personnel who have Leadership or Officer, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Pinned Down
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Planetary Survey
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Geology or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Primitive Culture
card.text: Unless you have Anthropology and Leadership or 3 Diplomacy or 2 Intelligence or four personnel who each have Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Pursuit Just Behind
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

card.name: Quarren Labor Shortage
card.text: Unless at least half your personnel are not {na}, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Recurring Injury
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Biology or a personnel who has 2 Medical, your opponent chooses an Biology or Medical personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pi

card.name: Skullduggery
card.text: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Acquisition or Treachery, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

card.name: Stellar Core Fragment
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Physics or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses an Physics or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pi

card.name: Sympathetic Magic
card.text: Unless you choose to place this dilemma on your ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

card.name: Systems Diagnostic
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Temptation
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel that does not have Honor or Treachery is stopped.

card.name: Tense Negotiations
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Leadership, your opponent chooses an Diplomacy or Leadership personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's

card.name: The Moon's a Window to Heaven
card.text: Unless you have a Leadership personnel who has Cunning>6 or Telepathy, randomly select a personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Trabe Grenade
card.text: Randomly select a personnel who has Leadership or Security. If that personnel has Cunning<7, he or she is killed.

card.name: Triage
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Biology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Unscientific Method
card.text: The most Cunning Science personnel who does not have Treachery is killed. Unless you have Cunning>24 remaining, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Vastly Outnumbered
card.text: If you have Strength>55, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have Anthropology and 2 Honor or two Hand Weapons or Integrity>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Wavefront
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Astrometrics or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, your opponent chooses an Astrometrics or Navigation personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its ow

card.name: Alien Gambling Device
card.text: When a random selection is made at this mission, you may ignore its result and select again. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Bajoran Phaser Pistol
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {baj} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Cardassian Phaser Pistol
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {car} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Engineering Kit
card.text: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Physics.

card.name: Engineering PADD
card.text: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Astrometrics.

card.name: Klingon Disruptor Pistol
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {kli} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Medical Kit
card.text: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Biology.

card.name: Medical Tricorder
card.text: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Exobiology.

card.name: Romulan Disruptor Pistol
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {rom} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Science PADD
card.text: Each of your Science personnel present gains Archaeology.

card.name: Starfleet Type-2 Phaser
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {fed} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: Tricorder
card.text: Each of your Science personnel present gains Geology.

card.name: A Chance for Glory
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your {kli} personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

card.name: A Treasure Beyond Comparison
card.text: Punishment. Plays in your core. When you place an opponent's personnel in your brig, you may draw a card.

card.name: Astrometrics Lab
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - Discard a card from hand to make your ship with your Astrometrics personnel aboard Range +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Awaiting Trial
card.text: Punishment. To play this event, you must command three {car} personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a captive, you may draw a card.

card.name: Back-Flush Bussard Collectors
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {fed} Engineer personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: BaH!
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {kli} ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, score 10 points.

card.name: Bajoran Gratitude Festival
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {baj} personnel. Remove up to four cards in your discard pile from the game, then draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Battle Drills
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your ship with your Gul aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Blind Spot
card.text: Pursuit. Plays on your ship. When an opponent's ship moves away from this mission, this ship may follow using its Range from your next turn.

card.name: Brutal Struggle
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your LEadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Cry 'Havoc!'
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: D'Arsay Archive
card.text: Count the number of cards in your hand, shuffle them, and place them on the bottom of your deck to draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Days of Atonement
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {baj} Anthropology personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Diplomatic Overture
card.text: Plays on a mission, if your {fed} Diplomacy personnel is at that mission. While a Diplomacy personnel is at this mission, that personnel's owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her skills.

card.name: Engage Cloak
card.text: Plays in your core. You may exectue only one order using this event each turn. Order - If there is no ship on this event, place your staffed ship that has a Cloaking Device on this event (While a ship is here, this event cannot leave play.) Order - If a s

card.name: Feast on the Dying
card.text: Examine the top two cards of your deck. You may replace either or both of them with a card from your discard pile, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

card.name: For All Our Sons
card.text: Plays on Cardassia Prime. At the start of each of your turns, if your Gul or Legate is at a different mission, you may examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other.

card.name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus?
card.text: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

card.name: Inspiring Leader
card.text: Plays on your ship (limit one per ship). While you have this ship's Commander aboard, it is Range+2.

card.name: Just Like Old Times
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, score 15 points.

card.name: Labor Camp
card.text: Punishment. Plays on your planet mission. At the start of each of your turns, if your {car} personnel is on this planet and you have a captive, score 10 points.

card.name: Let Honor Guide You
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {kli} Honor personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Line of Defense
card.text: Plays in your core. While your ship is at a mission that has a matching affiliation icon, it is Shields +2.

card.name: Nelvana Trap
card.text: Maneuver. Plays on an opponent's mission. When an opponent moves a ship to this mission, you may destroy this event to take each {rom} ship from your copies of Engage Cloak, place them at this mission, and begin an engagement involving them. If you win, r

card.name: No Love for the Spoon Heads
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {baj} personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved and you may destroy an event.

card.name: No Peace in Our Time
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Each of your {kli} Treachery personnel is Cunning +2. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {kli} Treachery personnel. If you win, randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Nothing That Happens is Truly Random
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {fed} Diplomacy personnel. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. An opponent chooses one of those cards to be destroyed, then you take the other two into hand. Destroy this event.

card.name: Observer from the Obsidian Order
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {car} personnel who has Leadership or Intelligence. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Order of the Bat'leth
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {kli} Honor personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Peacemaker or Predator?
card.text: Examine a number of cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of {rom} Leadership personnel you command. Replace those cards in any order. Destroy this event.

card.name: Pierce Their Defenses
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is

card.name: Point Blank Strike
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +4. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is

card.name: Precise Attack
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is

card.name: Prejudice and Politics
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - If your Praetor or Senator is on Romulus, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that opponent places that card in his or her hand. Otherwise, score 5 points, and that opponent places that card on the

card.name: Process Identification
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {car} personnel. Examine the top five cards of your deck. Take one of those cards into hand and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

card.name: Rescue Captives
card.text: Discard any number of cards from hand to take an equal number of your personnel from your opponents' brigs and place them on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

card.name: Resistance Tactics
card.text: Plays in your core. When combat or an engagement involving your {baj} card begins, you may destroy this event to prevent that combat or engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

card.name: Romulan Intelligence Network
card.text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a {rom} personnel at an opponent's planet mission, you may examine the top two cards of that opponent's deck. Place one of those cards on the bottom of that deck and the other one on top.

card.name: Standard Cardassian Procedure
card.text: Capture. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {car} ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

card.name: Tactical Planning
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {rom} Security personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Taken Prisoner
card.text: Assault. Capture. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {car} personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

card.name: Tapestry
card.text: Remove all the cards in your deck from the game. Take all the personnel and ships from your discard pile and shuffle them to form a new deck. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

card.name: The Orion Underworld
card.text: Crime. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {na} ship with your Thief aboard. If you win, score 10 points.

card.name: The Pillage of Bajor
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {car} personnel. Examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other. Destroy this event.

card.name: The Reman Mines
card.text: Plays on Supervise Dilithium Mine. Each of your {rom} ships is Range +1 for each Reman you command (limit +3).

card.name: To Boldly Go
card.text: To play this event, you must have completed a planet mission and a space mission. Plays in your core. When any of your {fed} personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to prevent that.

card.name: Warrior's Birthright
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {kli} personnel. Plays on your mission. You may meet Integrity and Cunning requirements of this mission and each dilemma you face at this mission using Strength instead.

card.name: Alternate Identity
card.text: Order - Replace a {rom} personnel you command with a {rom} personnel from your hand. Place the personnel you replaced in your discard pile.

card.name: Amanda Rogers
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner’s discard pile. Lose 5 points.

card.name: Arrest Order
card.text: Capture. To play this interrupt, you must command a {car} Security personnel equipped with a hand weapon at a non-headquarters mission. Order – Stop that personnel to randomly select an opponent’s personnel present to place in your brig.

card.name: Comfort Women
card.text: When your Gul or Legate is attempting a mission, he or she gains one skill from your non-{car} personnel at that mission. Also, each of your Guls and Legates involved is attributes +1. These effects last until the end of that mission attempt.

card.name: Condition Captive
card.text: Punishment. Order - Place your captive on your headquarters mission. You now command that personnel.

card.name: Dimensional Shifting
card.text: Order - Discard a random card from hand to place any number of your personnel and equipment at one mission aboard any ship at the same mission.

card.name: Empathic Touch
card.text: When your personnel is about to be killed, if your Telepathy personnel is present, stop both personnel to prevent that.

card.name: Escape
card.text: When any number of your personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed or placed in an opponent’s brig, discard a random card from hand to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

card.name: Evasive Maneuvers
card.text: Maneuver. When your ship with your Navigation personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

card.name: Kevin Uxbridge
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. Order - Destroy an event. Lose 5 points.

card.name: Lasting Peace
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command a {baj} Diplomacy personnel. Order - Place an equal number of {baj} personnel and non-{baj} personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Mission Briefing
card.text: When your {fed} personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your stopped {fed} personnel at the same mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Power to the Shields
card.text: Maneuver. When your ship with your Engineer personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

card.name: Protection of the Tal Shiar
card.text: When your non-Intelligence {rom} personnel is facing a dilemma,he or she is attributes +1 and gains all skills on one of your {rom} Intelligence personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Pursuit Course
card.text: Pursuit. Temporal. When an opponent’s ship moves away from a mission where you have a staffed ship, place that ship at the mission the opponent’s ship moves to.

card.name: Quantum Slipstream Drive
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command a ship with your Engineer personnel aboard. Order - That ship is Range +4 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Render Assistance
card.text: Maneuver. When an engagement involving your ship begins, another one of your ships at that mission joins the engagement.

card.name: Secret Conspiracy
card.text: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, add the skills (except Intelligence) of your {rom} Intelligence personnel at that mission to the mission’s requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent’s turn.

card.name: Sensor Sweep
card.text: Pursuit. To play this interrupt, you must command an Astrometrics personnel. Order - Download a Pursuit card.

card.name: Sermon
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command a personnel who has Anthropology and Leadership. When an opponent plays an event, place a random card from hand on top of your deck to prevent that event and place it on top of that opponent’s deck.

card.name: Shady Resources
card.text: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your other Treachery personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Souls of the Dead
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command three {baj} personnel. Order - Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

card.name: Symbol of Devotion
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command a Kai, Prylar, or Vedek. Order - Download a {baj} personnel, then place the Kai, Prylar, or Vedek you command on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: The Promise
card.text: When your {kli} personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills and attributes on a {kli} personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: The Tides of Fortune
card.text: When an opponent is facing a space dilemma, if your staffed {rom} ship is at that mission, that ship and your personnel aboard it face that dilemma instead. Score 10 points.

card.name: Ties of Blood and Water
card.text: When your {baj} personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills on a {baj} personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Torture
card.text: Punishment. You may play only one copy of this interrupt each turn. Order - Choose one of your captives. Each of your Intelligence personnel gains that captive's skills until the end of your turn.

card.name: Twist of Fate
card.text: When your {rom} personnel is about to be killed, randomly select another of your personnel present to be killed instead.

card.name: Abduction Plot
card.text: Transporters, Treachery, Cunning>34, and (Intelligence and Leadership or Law and Officer)

card.name: Access Relay Station
card.text: 2 Programming, Cunning>34, and (Engineer and Officer or Intelligence and Security)

card.name: Acquire Illicit Explosives
card.text: Physics, Treachery, Cunning>30, and (Astrometrics or Engineer) Region: Bajor System.

card.name: Amnesty Talks
card.text: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Law and Integrity>31 or Leadership, Security, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>36

card.name: Bajor (Gift of the Prophets)
card.text: You may play {baj} cards, {na} cards, and equipment at this mission. Region: Bajor System.

card.name: Cardassia Prime (Hardscrabble World)
card.text: You may play {car} cards, {na} cards, and equipment at this mission. Region: Cardassia System.

card.name: Cargo Rendezvous
card.text: Engineer, Physics, Transporters, and Integrity>29 or Acquisition, Transporters, Treachery, and Cunning>34

card.name: Changeling Research
